projects.title: Calculator
projects.desc: A simple calculator. Built for a Modern Developer project.

projects.title: Product Listing
projects.desc: A sample product listing page with shopping cart. Allows adding/removing from cart, applying coupons, and calculates totals. Built as a Modern Developer project and was a great exercise in more advanced layouts

projects.title: User Profile Page
projects.desc: A user profile page demonstrating much more complex layouts, and elements.

projects.title: Image Gallery
projects.desc: A simple, but cool image gallery. A focus on layouts and transitions.

projects.title: JavaScript 30
projects.desc: Wes Bos's JavaScript 30 course. I've also built a calendar looking frontend page for the exercises to make it easier to check out the projects. This is a great course on understanding advanced JavaScript/ES6

projects.title: Social Cards
projects.desc: I wanted to play with React on my own; no tutorials. Social cards allows the user to create a Social Card that they might use on different social media platforms.
